title: School Children Injured in Dramatic Crash Captured at Kansas Intersection
text:
Four school children were among the injured following a dramatic crash at an intersection in Overland Park, Kansas, on October 24. Police released video of the incident, urging motorists to pay attention.

“Yellow light means slow down not speed up,” they posted on Twitter.

This video shows a car attempting to make a left turn before getting slammed by another vehicle passing straight through the junction just after the lights go red.

One of the cars involved left the road after the collision, hitting a woman and four elementary school girls, according to local reports. Credit: Overland Park Police Department via Storyful
